string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "And I want you to know, you’re far from the usual."
"God knows that I’d do anything for a part two."
"What she mean to me is what I mean to rap."
"You had a lot of dreams that transformed to visions."
"When you was just a youngin’, your looks were so precious. But now you’re grown up, so fly, it’s like a blessin’. But ya can’t have a man look at ya for five seconds without ya bein’ insecure."
"Had a lot of moments that didn’t last forever, now you’re in the corner tryin’ to put it together – how to love."
"You had a lot of crooks try to steal your heart, never really had luck – couldn’t never figure out how to love."
"And I got the haters like when will he stop? Maybe a minute after never, so set your clocks."
"She my motivation, I’m her transportation. ‘Cause I let her ride, while I drive her crazy. Then I just keep going, going like I’m racing. When I’m done she hold me like a conversation."
"I put her on my plate, then I do the dishes."
"Rain on my head, call that brainstorming."
"Girl, I turn that thing into a rain forest."
"More beautiful than the world, word. Matter of fact, beautiful ain’t the word. Unexplainable is the beauty of her. And I’ll be the race car, hitting her curves."
"I’m in so much ice, they yell ‘Skate Wayne!"
"Tell ‘em kiss my ass, call it kiss and tell."
"I got through that sentence like a subject and a predicate."
"And I call it like I see it and my glasses on. But most of y’all don’t get the picture ‘less the flash is on."
"I beat the beat up, call it self defense."
"Life is the bitch, and death is her sister."
"So misunderstood, but what’s a world without enigma?"
"Swagger down pat, call my shit Patricia."
"Excuse my charisma, Vodka with a spritzer."
"I think you stand under me if you don’t understand me."
"Real G’s move in silence like Lasagna..."
"Try to kick me while I’m down. I’ll break your leg."
"Mind so sharp, I f*ck around and cut my head off."
"And I don’t mind when we fall out as long as we fall back into it."
"Smoke a lot of weed, but I could never forget ya."
"We probably ain’t supposed to be together, but I wonder if my love of her could last forever."
"And she ain’t sure about me, but can’t go without me."
"Damn you the sh*t, and I’ll rip my heart out, and hand you the sh*t."
"Appetite for lovin’, ma, I’m hungry like the scavenger."
"I’m cruisin’ on the road of life, but I need a passenger."
"Shawty I’m a pro and you are lookin’ like the prototype."
"And with her brain – she should make the honor roll."
"We at the pool and she lookin’ like a center fold."
"I’m just sayin’ with my love, I could feed her soul."
"Shawty badder than a 3 year old."
"Me and shawty go together like chemicals."
"Okay, you want me up in a cage, then I’ll come out in beast mode."
"Put the d*** in they mouth, so I guess it’s f*** what they say."
"I’m stickin to the script, you n*ggas skippin’ scenes."
"I don’t go around fire expectin’ not to sweat."
"Been to hell and back, I can show you vouchers."
"Yeah, my life a bitch, but you nothin’ bout her."
"But it’s f*ck the world, get a child out her."
"Throw dirt on me and grow a wild flower."
"I don’t like to stop. I believe when you stop, you die."
"With the gun in this position, you could call it Kamasutra."
"This is brain surgery. Ski masks on my bullets, let ‘em commit brain burglary. Emergency, it’s an emergency. Someone in all black left the whole scene burgundy."
"You just see Jill on the hill, I knock Jack off."
"Shoot you on the front porch and knock you to the back yard."
"And I keep that hammer, do you wanna get nailed down?"
"I take you farther than Zimbabwe."
"Paper chasin’, money runnin’ like andale."
"I school you n*ggas, but none of yous get A’s."
"All you boys bustas, so soft, bet the wind blew ‘em."
"I’ma call my guns jumpers, cause my bullets just leapin to ‘em."
"Call me Mr. Kill Em All."
"My word is my pride, the wisdom is weak, and that’s word from the wise."
"Confidence is a stain they can’t wipe off."
"Just hope you heaven sent and you’re hell proof."
"The spot gets smaller and I get bigger tryin’ to get in where I fit in."
"The top gets higher the more that I climb."
"I search, but never find. Hurt, but never cry. I work and forever tired."
"You keep the sunshine, save me the rain."
"I seen nights full of pain, days of the same."
"I got ice in my veins, blood in my eyes, hate in my heart, love in my mind."
"Midnight cowboy. My flow is a dog, down boy."
"I’m the cashier, I change girls."
"And haters at an all-time high. Everybody got a hater like a f*ckin’ iPod."
"Stuck in the hood, like they poured cement on us."
"Hope you ain’t too tired to cry and I hope you know you ain’t never too alive to die."
"And I’m seeing what you need and I’m thinkin’ it’s me."
"And Weezy transform a good girl to a freak."
"I transform smaller and she puts me in her pants."
"I can turn you from a human to a Carter. Take you off the bench, turn you to a starter."
"I can transform ya, like a transformer."
"I can change your life, make it so new. Make you never want to go back to the old you."
"I shoot you nine times like you was 50, but you won’t be as likely as 50."
"I don’t need the Hot Boyz, I still keep my heat."
"Even in the dungeon, I glow. Even if it ain’t sunny, I glow."
"Life’s a b*tch, now die for her."
"Elevator in my crib ’cause it’s 5 floors. I’m not expectin’ you to have one in yours."
"We are not the same. I’m a martian, this is Space Jam."
"Put me in the wild — I be there for a while."
"If you’s a hater. I’m eatin’, you’s a waiter."
"We the motha f*cka’s like M.I.L.F., my n*gga."
"I love my baby mamas, they my highest honors."
"B*tch, I go hard like the boy from 300."
"Stop playin, I’m fresher than a Degree stick."
"Well of course, I smoke mad weed, I’m on my high horse."
"Money spread like germs, get sick n*gga."
"Make the girls say my name like roll call."
"Time to do the thing, that’s word to your wrist watch."
"And everybody watch your back when you’re in the front."
"The money keep calling, I hear this sh*t dialing, and they say money talks, you can hear my sh*t holler’n."
"Crown fit me good, I ain’t even got to try on."
"I look in the flames and see the hotter me."
"I’m the bomb baby, watch me nuke this sh-t."
"I pop like lolli’s, you drop like eyelids."
"New Orleans coroner, his name is Frank Minyard, f-ck with me wrong, you’ll be waking up in his yard."
"I still eat rappers. Mmm. Scrumptious."
"Man I go crazy on the beat I go Nimrod. Man I act a ass, treat the beat like a hemorrhoid. Man I go to work on the beat, call it employ. Man I kicks it, b-tch get your shin guard."
"Pump to your chest, I ain’t talking CPR."
"Ran into a super woman, turned her to a super bitch, hit her with that super d-ck, she be cumming super quick."
"My pockets too deep, I f-ck around and drown her. All we do is shop until we drop."
"I take her to the vet, cause she a bad bitch."
"Pockets too deep, shawty you gon’ have to climb out."
"She wants to own me and I ain’t trying to fight it."
